Preset - Carousel


This demo show how to display an advanced gallery. Click an image to focus it and a second click will open a lightbox.

You can press arrow left and right on your keyboard to navigate through the images. The rondell will automatically continue to rotate through the gallery when your mouse leaves it's area.

The lightbox is powered by Fancybox.

Here's how it's done

// Create a rondell with the 'carousel' preset and set an option 
// to disable the rondell when the lightbox is active
$('#rondellGallery > a').rondell({
  preset: "carousel",
  isActive: function() {
    return !$("#fancybox-wrap").is(":visible");
  }
}); 

// Initialize fancybox for links to full size images
$('#rondellGallery > a').fancybox({
  hideOnContentClick: false,
  padding: 10,
  scrolling: "no",
  onStart: function(items, idx) {
    return $(items[idx]).parent().hasClass("rondellItemFocused");
  }
});


Preset - Cubic


This demo fetches links & images from my brothers great webservice wookmark.com and creates a rondell from the data.

This example shows a carousel with a cubic function for the animation. The images titles are used as caption and clicking the focused element will open the wookmark in a new tab or window.

Here's how it's done

$.ajax({
  url: 'http://www.wookmark.com/api/json',
  dataType: 'jsonp',
  success: function(json, text, xhqr) {
    if (text == 'success') {
      var items = json,
          rondellContainer = $('#rondellCubic').empty();

      // Parsing returned json data
      $.each(items, function(idx, item) {
        if (idx >= 20) return false;

        // Create link container
        var newItem = $('<a/>')
        .css('opacity', 0)
        .attr({
          href: item.url,
          title: item.title,
          target: '_blank'
        });

        // Create image
        var newImg = $('<img/>')
        .addClass('resizeable')
        .attr({
          src: item.preview,
          alt: item.title,
          width: item.width,
          height: item.height
        });

        // Append image to link and link to container for the rondell
        newItem.append(newImg);
        rondellContainer.append(newItem);
      });

      // Create wookmark carousel 
      $('a', rondellContainer).rondell({
        preset: 'cubic'                               
      });
    }
  }
});
